languages.text: {n}Вигастис с неимоверным усилием поднимает руку, чтобы отдать честь, после чего вновь оседает на свое потрепанное лазружье.{/n} "Я превозмогу все свои раны ради того, чтобы воздать ему должное, Ваша Светлость. Только прикажите. Умоляю, прикажите".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигастис с неимоверным усилием поднимает руку, чтобы отдать честь, после чего вновь оседает на свое потрепанное лазружье.{/n} "Я превозмогу все свои раны ради того, чтобы воздать ему должное, Ваша Светлость. Только прикажите. Умоляю, прикажите".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигастис с неимоверным усилием поднимает руку, чтобы отдать честь, после чего вновь оседает на свое потрепанное лазружье.{/n} "Я превозмогу все свои раны ради того, чтобы воздать ему должное, Ваша Светлость. Только прикажите. Умоляю, прикажите".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes musters all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his worn lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes musters all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his worn lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes musters all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your call. I beg of you. Just give the order."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes musters all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your call. I beg of you. Just give the order."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}ヴィガステスは力の限りを振り絞って手であなたに敬礼し、その後、ボロボロのラスガンに倒れ込んだ。{/n}「奴にそれ相応の罰を与えることができれば、この体の数々の傷も報われるでしょう、陛下。ご命令ください。後はあなたに委ねます。お願いします」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィガステスは力の限りを振り絞って手であなたに敬礼し、その後、ボロボロのラスガンに倒れ込んだ。{/n}「奴にそれ相応の罰を与えることができれば、この体の数々の傷も報われるでしょう、陛下。ご命令ください。後はあなたに委ねます。お願いします」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}维加斯特鼓起所有的力量，向你郑重地敬了个礼，随后勉强用那把破破烂烂的激光枪支撑着身体。{/n}“只要能让他得到他应有的惩罚，无论我受了多重的伤，我都愿意为您而战，大人。您只要下令就好，求您了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}维加斯特鼓起所有的力量，向你郑重地敬了个礼，随后勉强用那把破破烂烂的激光枪支撑着身体。{/n}“只要能让他得到他应有的惩罚，无论我受了多重的伤，我都愿意为您而战，大人。一切都由您说了算，您只要一声令下就好。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Vigastes hace acopio de todas sus fuerzas para saludarte con la mano antes de desplomarse sobre el soporte de su destartalado rifle láser.{/n} «Soportaré todas mis heridas sólo para darle lo que se merece. Usted manda. Solo dé la orden. Se lo ruego».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes hace acopio de todas sus fuerzas para saludarte con la mano antes de desplomarse sobre el soporte de su destartalado rifle láser.{/n} «Soportaré todas mis heridas sólo para darle lo que se merece. Usted manda. Se lo ruego. Solo dé la orden».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Vigastes nimmt all seine Kraft zusammen, um vor dir zu salutieren, ehe er sich schnell wieder auf sein ramponiertes Lasergewehr stützt.{/n} "Ich ignoriere alle meine Wunden, nur um ihm zu geben, was er verdient, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Erteilt einfach den Befehl. Ich flehe Euch an."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes nimmt all seine Kraft zusammen, um vor dir zu salutieren, bevor er sich schnell wieder auf sein ramponiertes Lasergewehr stützt.{/n} "Ich ignoriere alle meine Wunden, nur um ihm zu geben, was er verdient, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr entscheidet. Ich flehe Euch an. Erteilt mir den Befehl."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Vigastes rassemble le peu de force qu'il lui reste pour vous saluer d'une main avant de s'effondrer à nouveau sur son fusil laser.{/n} « Mes blessures ne m'empêcheraient pas de lui donner ce qu'il mérite, Votre Seigneurie. Donnez l'ordre. Je vous en conjure. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes rassemble le peu de force qu'il lui reste pour vous saluer d'une main avant de s'effondrer à nouveau sur son fusil laser.{/n} « Mes blessures ne m'empêcheraient pas de lui donner ce qu'il mérite, Votre Seigneurie. C'est à vous de voir. Mais je vous en conjure. Donnez en moi l'ordre. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Vigastes, tüm gücünü toplayarak eliyle seni selamlıyor. Ardından kendini külüstür silazerinin desteğine bırakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sırf ona hak ettiğini vermek için tüm bu yaralarımı hiçe sayarım. Emri verin, yeter. Rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigastes summons all his strength to salute you with his hand before slumping back onto the support of his ramshackle lasgun.{/n} "I will scorn all my wounds just to give him what he deserves, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just give the order. I beg of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigastes, eliyle seni selamlamak için tüm gücünü topluyor. Ardından kendini külüstür silazerinin desteğine bırakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sırf ona hak ettiğini vermek için tüm bu yaralarımı hiçe sayarım. Emri verin, yeter. Rica ediyorum."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
